amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit lands being transferred from Forest Service to National Park Service based on management under a current memorandum of understanding.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 116-264 to limit lands being transferred from Forest Service to National Park Service based on management under a current memorandum of understanding.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 231 (Roll no. 606).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 231 (Roll no. 606).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Tipton.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
